ProductInfo.Features:
Up to 9 hours batter life: Thanks to SSD in MacBook Air, there's plenty of room for a big battery. Working together with the new Intel Core architecture, this battery can post some impressive numbers. Put MacBook Air to sleep for more than 3 hours, and it enters standby mode to conserve battery life for up to 30 days.
Fourth-generation Intel Core processors: MacBook Air is powered by the all-new fourth-generation Intel Core i5 and i7 processors. This ultra-efficient architecture was designed to use less power and still deliver high performance. Which means not only can you do whatever you want you can keep doing it for longer than before.
HD Graphics 5000: Intel HD Graphics 5000 offers up to 40 percent faster graphics performance you'll especially notice with games and other graphics-intensive tasks.
Up to 3x faster Wi-Fi: MacBook Air now supports ultrafast 802.11ac Wi-Fi. When connected to an 802.11ac base station including the new AirPort Extreme and AirPort Time Capsule wireless performance is up to 3x faster than with the previous generation of MacBook Air.
Faster all-flash storage: Part of what makes MacBook Air so responsive is that it's designed entirely around flash storage. Not only does this make MacBook Air much lighter and more portable than traditional notebooks, it also provides faster access to data.
ProductInfo.Name: Apple 11.6" MacBook Air Notebook Computer, 1.7GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i7, 4GB RAM, 512GB Flash Storage, Mac OS X Mavericks
